chart.name: Network Throughput (bytes/sec)
chart.programText:
A = data('pod_network_receive_bytes_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes'), extrapolation='zero').sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('pod_network_transmit_bytes_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes'), extrapolation='zero').sum().publish(label='B')

chart.description: Network receive and transmit errors from pods on this node
chart.name: Pod Network Errors by Interface
chart.programText:
A = data('pod_network_receive_errors_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['interface']).publish(label='A')
B = data('pod_network_transmit_errors_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['interface']).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Pods by Phase
chart.programText:
A = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').below(1, inclusive=True).count().publish(label='A')
B = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').between(1.1, 2, low_inclusive=True, high_inclusive=True).count().publish(label='B')
C = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').between(2.1, 3, low_inclusive=True, high_inclusive=True).count().publish(label='C')
D = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').between(3.1, 4, low_inclusive=True, high_inclusive=True).count().publish(label='D')
E = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').above(4).count().publish(label='E')

chart.name: Net Pods Desired by Replication Controller
Top Nodes by Network Usage
chart.programText:
A = data('pod_network_receive_bytes_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes'), extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('pod_network_transmit_bytes_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes'), extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A+B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Based on Pod spec's resources.limits.cpu value if present, otherwise chart will be blank.
chart.name: % CPU Limit Used per Container
chart.programText:
A = data('container_cpu_utilization', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['container_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('container_spec_cpu_quota', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['container_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('container_spec_cpu_period', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['container_name']).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (A/(B/C)).sum(by=['container_name']).publish(label='D')

publishLabelOptions.displayName: container_cpu_utilization - Sum by kubernetes_pod_name - Mean(1m) - Count
publishLabelOptions.label: A

publishLabelOptions.displayName: container_cpu_utilization - Sum by kubernetes_pod_name - Mean(1m) - Count by host
publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.description: Based on Kubernetes resource limits.  If no limits, will be blank.
chart.name: % Memory Used per Pod
chart.programText:
A = data('container_memory_usage_bytes', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('container_spec_memory_limit_bytes', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_name']).above(0, inclusive=True).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A/B*100).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Top 10 Pods by % CPU Used
chart.programText:
A = data('container_cpu_utilization', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes'), extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['host', 'kubernetes_pod_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
E = data('machine_cpu_cores').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = (A/E).top(count=10).publish(label='F')

chart.name: Deployments Not at Spec
chart.programText:
A = data('kubernetes.deployment.available', extrapolation='zero').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('kubernetes.deployment.desired', extrapolation='zero').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B-A).above(0).count().publish(label='C')

chart.description: This may include "pause" containers used internally by K8s
chart.name: Top 10 Pods by # Containers

publishLabelOptions.displayName: container_cpu_utilization - Mean(1m) - Count by kubernetes_pod_name - Top 10
publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.name: Top 10 Pods by Average Container Memory Usage
Pods by Phase
chart.programText:
A = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').below(1, inclusive=True).count().publish(label='A')
B = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').between(1.1, 2, low_inclusive=True, high_inclusive=True).count().publish(label='B')
C = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').between(2.1, 3, low_inclusive=True, high_inclusive=True).count().publish(label='C')
D = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').between(3.1, 4, low_inclusive=True, high_inclusive=True).count().publish(label='D')
E = data('kubernetes.pod_phase', rollup='latest').above(4).count().publish(label='E')

A = data('pod_network_receive_errors_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('pod_network_transmit_errors_total', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.programText:

B = data('container_spec_cpu_quota', filter=filter('metric_source', 'kubernetes')).sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)

chart.name: # Active Containers
Top 10 Nodes by CPU Capacity Usage %
chart.programText:
A = data('container_cpu_utilization').sum(by=['host', 'kubernetes_cluster']).mean(over='1m').publish(label='A', enable=False)
G = data('machine_cpu_cores').sum(by=['host', 'kubernetes_cluster']).mean(over='1m').publish(label='G', enable=False)
L = (A/G).top(count=10).publish(label='L')
